law.catch_line: Application of provisions; to whom permit application made.

text.section:
Sec. 13-1. Application of provisions; to whom permit application made.
This chapter shall apply to both the incorporated and unincorporated areas of Miami-Dade County, Florida. This chapter shall apply, at blasting sites, to the use and storage of explosives and blasting agents. Application for county licenses and/or user permits required herein shall be made to the Director of the Miami-Dade County Public Works Department.
